pages.title: Admin Editable Legacy Demo
pages.description: This is a demo legacy page fully controlled from /admin.
pages.heading: Legacy Content Editable From Admin

sections.title: How it works
paragraphs: This page exists to prove that any legacy slug can be edited from the admin panel.
Use the Legacy Overrides collection, pick your locale file, and add an item with the exact slug.

sections.title: What to edit
paragraphs: You can edit title, description, heading, sections, hero image, and bullet points without changing code.
